saferJourney.heading: Introducing a safer journey
saferJourney.subtext: Join our community of safe travelers!

howItWorks.headline: How to enhance your safety
howItWorks.subtext: Just 3 simple steps to travel safely. Our easy flow helps you create a secure digital ID, stay informed with alerts and enjoy peace of mind as you explore.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.description: Create your secure digital ID. We verify identity using tamper-proof technology so you carry a trusted ID on your device.

steps.title: Step 2
steps.description: Receive alerts and updates about safety incidents in areas you visit — timely notifications help you avoid unsafe situations.

steps.title: Step 3
steps.description: Enjoy peace of mind while you explore. Use our verified profiles with partner hotels, tour operators, and local authorities.

features.title: Blockchain Security
features.description: Every ID is verified with blockchain technology to prevent fraud and ensure safety.

features.title: Global Acceptance
features.description: Trusted by international travel agencies and hotels for seamless verification.

features.title: Easy Access
features.description: Your ID is always with you on your smartphone, no extra documents needed.
